title: The Multisite Antiferromagnetic Ising Spin Model and Universality of Feigenbaum Constants
abstract: The Feigenbaum constants $\alpha$ and $\delta$ for the three-site antiferromagnetic Ising spin model on Husimi tree are calculated. It is shown that the numerical values of these constants for this real physical system coincide with the famous universal Feigenbaum constants with high accuracy. The quantitative description from ordering to chaos is also obtained.
